name: gatsby-plugin-advanced-sitemap-modest
description: Identical to the [gatsby-plugin-advanced-sitemap](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/plugins/gatsby-plugin-advanced-sitemap/) but includes the `hideAttribution` option that's been up as a (pull request)[https://github.com/TryGhost/gatsby-plugin-advanced-sitemap/pull/158] by (sonaltr)[https://github.com/sonaltr]
author: Ghost
